title: OBS Studio
description: Free and open-source software for video recording and live streaming. Supports multiple sources, scenes, and real-time audio/video mixing with high-performance capture.

title: FFmpeg
description: A complete, cross-platform solution to record, convert, and stream audio and video. The backbone of most media processing pipelines worldwide.

title: DaVinci Resolve
description: Professional video editing, color correction, visual effects, and audio post-production all in one tool. Free version includes nearly all features.

title: VLC Media Player
description: Free, open-source, cross-platform multimedia player that plays most multimedia files and various streaming protocols.

title: HandBrake
description: Open-source video transcoder for converting video from nearly any format to a selection of modern, widely supported codecs.

title: Blender
description: Free and open-source 3D creation suite supporting the entire 3D pipeline: modeling, rigging, animation, simulation, rendering, compositing, and video editing.

title: Jellyfin
description: The free software media system that puts you in control of managing and streaming your media. No proprietary licenses or tracking.

title: Plex
description: Stream movies, TV shows, music, and more from your personal media library to any device, anywhere. Includes automatic metadata fetching.

title: Audacity
description: Free, open-source, cross-platform audio software for multi-track recording and editing. Supports effects, plugins, and a wide range of audio formats.

title: Kdenlive
description: Free and open-source video editor based on the MLT Framework and KDE Frameworks. Supports multi-track editing with a wide range of effects.

title: Jitsi Meet
description: Fully encrypted, open-source video conferencing solution that you can use all day, every day, for free with no account needed.

title: Synfig Studio
description: Open-source 2D animation software designed for producing film-quality animation using a vector and bitmap artwork approach.

title: ShareX
description: Free and open-source screen capture, file sharing, and productivity tool. Supports screen recording, scrolling capture, and OCR.

title: Streamlink
description: Command-line utility that extracts streams from various services and pipes them into a video player of your choice.

title: Matomo
description: Open-source web analytics platform that gives you full ownership of your data. Includes video and media analytics capabilities.
